name: a11y-dialog
description: A tiny script to make dialog windows accessible to assistive technology users.
author: Hugo “Kitty” Giraudel (https://hugogiraudel.com)

scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run copy
scripts.extract-version: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]'
scripts.add-version:
echo "/*! a11y-dialog $(npm run extract-version --silent) — © Edenspiekermann */
$(cat a11y-dialog.min.js)" > a11y-dialog.min.js
scripts.size: npm run build --silent && npm run compress --silent && npm run show --silent && rm a11y-dialog.min.js.gz
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'Update book' && git push git@github.com:edenspiekermann/a11y-dialog gh-pages --force
